黀字的基本解释

黀
zōu
麻秆。

黀字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zōu］
［《廣韻》側鳩切，平尤，莊。］
麻的茎秆。

黀字的康熙字典解释

【亥集下】【麻字部】　黀； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页1515第23
〔古文〕?【唐韻】惻鳩切【集韻】【韻會】甾尤切【正韻】側鳩切，?音鄒。【說文】麻䕸也。【玉篇】麻莖也。【廣韻】聚麻也。【楚辭·七諫】菎蕗雜於黀蒸兮。【字彙】黀曰麻蒸，卽麻幹，本一物也。王逸註：枲翮曰黀，煏竹曰蒸，則析爲二矣。　又作菆。【潘岳·西征賦】感市閭之菆井。【李善註】菆，麻蒸也。菆井，卽渭城賣蒸之市。　又作掫。【前漢·五行志】建平四年，民驚走持槀或掫一枚。【如淳註】掫，麻幹也。

黀字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
黀字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Cyan
zōu
Hemp stalks.
Cyan
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zōu］
["Guangyun" side dove cut, Pingyou, Zhuang. ]
Stalks of hemp.
Cyan
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Ji 2] [Ma Character Department] 　黀; Kangxi Strokes: 19; Page Number: Page 1515 Page 23
[Ancient text]? [Tang Yun] Xun Dove Cut [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] Zi Youqie [Zheng Yun] Side Dove Cut,? Yin Zou. [Said the text] Ma Pi also. [Jade articles] Hemp stems also. [Guang Yun] Ju Ma Ye. [Songs of the Chu·Seven Admonitions] Idyllium is mixed with steaming. [Vocabulary] It is said that steamed hemp, dried hemp, this is also a thing. Wang Yi's note: Naihuo means cyanosis, and squash bamboo means steaming, so it is analyzed as two 矣.　It's also called 菆. [Pan Yue·Xi Zheng Fu] Ganshi Luzhi Changjing. 【Li Shan's Note】Mao, steamed with hemp. Chaojing, the city where steamed steamers are sold in Weiwei City.　 Make another break. [Previous Han·Five Elements History] In the 4th year of Jianping, the people were shocked to hold or pick one. [Ru Chun's Note] Chop, hemp dry.
